biotools.summary: Tool for cross-referencing microarray data derived from different species and across different expression analysis platforms. Built using the analysis of ESTs, the TIGR Gene Index (TGI), and Eukaryotic Gene Orthologs (EGO) databases.

bioschemas.name: Resourcerer
bioschemas.summary: Tool for cross-referencing microarray data derived from different species and across different expression analysis platforms. Built using the analysis of ESTs, the TIGR Gene Index (TGI), and Eukaryotic Gene Orthologs (EGO) databases.
